colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (CES 'PHAGS PA BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I SMON LAM GYI RGYAL PO'I MDO BKLAG CHO GA DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG CES BYA BA 'DI YANG, MDO SNGAGS YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN CHEN PO DGE BSHES CHOS RJE DGE SLONG MGON SKYABS MTSAN CAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL MDZAD BZHIN DU, DUS DBANG GIS PHYOGS MED DU 'KHYAMS PA'I BTZUN PA MKHAN PO CHOS RJE DGE SLONG YE SHES DPAL LDAN GYIS RANG GZO SPANGS TE, SANGS RGYAS KYI DGONGS PA DANG, SNGON BYON GYI BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I MDO BKLAG CHO GA SPYI DANG SGO BDUN PA, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME YOS LO'I RGYAL ZLA BA'I YAR TSES BZANG POR GSER GYI SKE RAGS ZHES PA'I CHAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE SHOG GUR 'DU BYED PA PO NI, RANG GI TSA BO DANG LDAN GU SHRI DGE BSGOS BKRA SHIS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DI KYANG BLO BZANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS @010A *, ,PA DANG, BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU DAM PA RNAMS KYIS ZHABS PAD BRTAN CING MAR GYUR SEMS CAN THAMS CAD BDE SKYID KYI DPAL LA LONGS SPYOD NAS MYUR DU RGYAL BA'I GO 'PHANG 'THOB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,'DI YANG AOR TO SU TI YAN CHI BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DANG TSA HAR THER GUNG TI MCHI BLO BZANG MI 'GYUR GNYIS KYI SPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I DGE BAS 'DI PHYI'I LEGS TSOGS THAMS CAD YIN BZHIN 'GRUB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
